entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:59 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -4.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 1:30 PM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -4.4°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.8 kPa falling
Visibility: 0.8 km
Humidity: 95 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.1°C
Wind: ENE 40 km/h gust 53 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Amount 15 to 25 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along exposed areas of the coast. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 30 km/h gusting to 60. Low minus 5. Wind chill near minus 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 10. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Clear. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Clear. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 5. Forecast issued 11:00 AM NST Tuesday 10 January 2023
